data.title: Terminator Themes (Terminator Theme Covers)
data.text:
This list includes only covers of the Terminator Theme (T-Theme), which means all songs that feature the Terminator main theme (originally composed by Brad Ira Fiedel). The official versions (by Brad Ira Fiedel & Marco Beltrami) will not be represented in this list. Comments will be added later.

T-HOPE Top 10

1. Exit On Twelve - The Terminator (Demo)

2. TCM - Theme from 'Terminator'

3. Justin R. Durban - Edgen Terminator Theme

4. Justin R. Durban - Edgen Terminator Theme 1

5. Erich Kunzel - Cybergenesis & Terminator Theme

6. John Thomas Taylor - Terminator 2 Theme

7. ?? - Theme from the Terminator (T3 Superbowl spot)

8. Magic Box Music - Theme from the Terminator (T3 NCAA Spot)

9. ?? - TerminatorXT

10. Nostromo - Theme from Terminator
